tasks.task: Construct and maintain a home water collection system
subtasks: Install gutters on four corners of a home
Position water traps under gutter downspouts
Use adapters to create a three-inch choke point for a floating ball valve
Apply UV-resistant paint to exposed PVC pipes
Install a three-inch floating ball valve to capture initial runoff
Equate clean-out valves for easy cleaning of the system
Protect the water collection tote from UV radiation by painting it black
Securely attach a screening mesh to the tote's bottom for debris capture
Utilize irrigation adapter threads to connect the collection system to a water hose
Install a filtering mechanism (e.g., cheese cloth) to pre-screen large debris
Regularly clean the filter to maintain water quality
